alert.note: Alert for Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 11:45PM CST until January 26 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Tres Palacios River near Midfield affecting Matagorda and Wharton Counties. For the Tres Palacios River...including Midfield...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tres Palacios River near Midfield. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins as water spills into the flood plain on the right upstream bank and covers the meander point at the meander curve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 PM CST Wednesday was 24.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late this evening to 23.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 24.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will fall below flood stage again tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.5 feet on 01/27/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tres Palacios River Midfield 24.0 24.4 Wed 11 pm CS 22.3 12.2 6.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 545 PM CST.
